TopicTitle: KSC Underwater... does this happen to anyone else?

Articles.Content:
This happens somewhat regularly. I'm not sure if it's me... or is this something that other people experience?

Sometimes when I go back to the Space Center either from the Tracking Station or the VAB/SPH.... KSC will be under water.

Often it's the entire VAB that is under water. Other times it's sticking out. In this case, the little air traffic control tower is also slightly poking out of the water.

Here's my full mod list (for reference):

Edited September 21, 2017 by scottadges
I believe some people have blaimed Scatterer.
It is a purely visual glitch caused by scatterer.
Hold my beer:

Nuff Kerman: the KSC is now a semi-atlantis. nuff' said.
